PARTS.desc: if passed after a PART it finds not the part but things related to it

COPPER_FITTING_SHORTHAND.desc: like 12c90 means elbow fitting of dimensions, copper, bend

ELBOW_FITTING_SHORTHAND.desc: like 45 or 90 means elbow fitting of that bend

COPPER_COUPLING_STOP_SHORTHAND.desc: 12ccws means 1/2 copper stop coupling CCWS = copper coupling with stop

VIEGA_COUPLING_STOP_SHORTHAND.desc: pccws VIEGA COUPLING WITH STOP, size is first num

VIEGA_UNION_SHORTHAND.desc: pcu means VIEGA UNION, size is the first num

BLACK_IRON_COUPLING_SHORTHAND.desc: black iron coupling means **MALLEABLE** IRON COUPLING

BLACK_IRON_CAP_SHORTHAND.desc: black iron cap means **MALLEABLE** IRON CAP

BLACK_IRON_BUSHING_SHORTHAND.desc: black iron bushing means **CAST** IRON BUSHING

PVC_CAP_FITTING_SHORTHAND.desc: Size, Schedule (40 or 80) K for cap

PVC_COUPLING_FITTING_SHORTHAND.desc: Size and PC for pvc coupling

PVCDWV_TEE_FITTING_SHORTHAND.desc: Size and PT for pvc tee

PEX_PIPE_SHORTHAND.desc: Diameter x Length, Brand(zurn or uponor), Color (blue, red, white)

LOWBOY.desc: detect any text with the word lowboy, which means a short water heater
